SELECT ,
FROM student_course sc LEFT JOIN student s ON sc.student_sid = s.sid LEFT JOIN course c ON sc.course_cid = c.cid
AND sc.semester = #{semester}
AND sc.status = #{status}
AND s.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{studentName}, '%')
AND s.student_no LIKE CONCAT('%', #{studentNo}, '%')
AND c.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{courseName}, '%')
AND c.course_no LIKE CONCAT('%', #{courseNo}, '%')
ORDER BY sc.selection_date DESC
